body: imagine ordering a sexaroid and u get received 2 when ordering 1, yet when checking the order a message says: CONGRATULATIONS!!! for our dear customer we give you a special combo, u get a pair to satisfy ur sexual desires but cant remove your virginity from a real woman. Idk i made this... have a long fap
Also, I hate that the logic "Want to make up? Let's have a threesome!" actually isn't that surprising to me. I've gotten so desensitized to hentai logic at this point.
How to make human trading is acceptable in hentai? Turn them into android (but basically the same)

Their parents get home the next day, and MC, being a dumbass, assumes that because his sisters are treating him they way they used to in front of their parents rather than flirting with him or grinding against him or whatever, that must mean their sexual relationship is over and done with. The lucky bastard turns out to be wrong though, as both his sisters come knocking on his bedroom door that night. (There is no chapter four, unfortunately.) 2/2

Since I guess some people were too focused on the titties to actually read the full story, here's a recap: the first nineteen pages are a manga drawn by a male middle child, in which he reimagines his two sisters as androids he owns for the express purpose of his sexual gratification. His sisters find it and, in a rare bout of realism, hold it over his head and threaten to show it to their parents when they get back from their vacation. The main character's luck turns around when he wanders half-asleep into the living room one night and catches her masturbating to his manga. She pretends he's having a dream about the android version of her, and because MC is a dumbass, he falls for it, fucks her, she realizes she's into it, and they start fucking for real. The little sister is jealous of this, the older sister notices, and arranges for the three of them to have a threesome. (1/2)
∞ A Manga within a Manga within a Manga within a Manga within a Manga ∞
The extra concept of them being sexdriods was pointless. Remove that and the story makes more sense.
One of my favourite,glad I found it here again.
Hey!! At least his dreams came true :3
